Product Description

EASEPRES 6 Trays Desktop Document Letter Tray Organizer, Black

Perfect for Office, Home and School

The desk organizer is perfect for organizing and storing files, folders and bills to reduce the amount of clutter in your office, home or school.

Save More Space

Conveniently store and quickly access regular letter/A4 size or folders. Each tray is spaced 2.4 inch apart to accommodate a single ream of paper.

Strong & Stable Design

Made of sturdy metal with a black finish, this magazine holder boasts 6 tiers designed to hold magazines horizontally.

For Desktop Use

The office desk holder is capable of standing on your desk or counter top. (hardware included)

Item Type
Wall Organizer File Folder Mail Sorter Letter Tray Storage Baskets

Material Type
Wire Mesh Wire Mesh Wire Mesh Wire Mesh Wire Mesh

Color
Black Black Black Black Black

Desktop file organizer is great for holding Letter/A4 size paper, folders, binders, stationary and notebooks
Top 5 tilted trays for easy accessing document; the bottom flat tray is great for stationary, desk accessories, full advantage of your vertical space and keep your desktop clear
Mesh construction desk file organizer, frame is constructed of industrial-strength steel wire mesh, and reinforced with a solid steel frame
Easy to assembly with directions, screws and simple screwdriver are all included in the office organizer package
Mesh office Desk Organizer Dimension: 12.6”L x 9”W x 15.5”H

(as of Nov 30,2022 03:47:08 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The Ultimate Wall Organizer

Designed to look good and work even better, this hanging file organizer by NEATERIZE is the perfect solution for narrow or small spaces where desk space is limited. Made from sturdy metal, each of the four divider pockets can be used as a mail holder or wall file organizer for the home or office. The bottom ledge can be used to hold pencils, pens, sticky notepads, or even as a technology docking station for your smartphone.

The colorful options also make this a great way to organize kids’ school work, drawings, coloring books, and more and are a must-have for teachers. Get one for every room in your home and be amazed at how easy organization becomes! NEATERIZE makes it possible!

ORGANIZE IT ALL: From mails to notes, bills to books everything you need is accessible yet protected DAZZLING COLORS: With 7 unique colors to choose from, you can express your creativity and style. EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Wall screws are included. Start organizing it right away with easy installation!

★ THE COMPLETE WALL ORGANIZER FOR OFFICE: Everything you need for a mail organizer including the wall mount, all in one place. Super easy installation. Start using this wall file organizer right away to hold documents, files, notebooks and more all in one place for easy access. Perfect for the home office, the classroom or anywhere that you need a large wall organizer that’s durable and can hold serious weight without falling, bowing, bending or breaking.
★ THE ULTIMATE WALL HANGING FILE FOLDER ORGANIZER: No assembly needed. Just hang and use right away. This hanging mail organizer is attractive enough to use as a file holder wall mounted or as a standing file organizer if you wish. Comes in your choice of 3 colors, making it a great way to organize bills, tablets, notebooks, portfolios, photos, coloring books, magazines and so much more. Ideal as a hanging desk organizer too, with ample storage for your phone or digital devices underneath.
★ FITS IN TIGHT SPACES: Measures 12.5(l) x 4(w) x 16(h) inches but fits easily in tight or narrow spaces. Multi-use all paper holder for all your documents. The tray underneath also holds pens, notepads, staplers, bookmarks and more within easy reach, making it great for sorting mail, bills, photos, files, papers, magazines and more. Also great for storing cookbooks and recipes in the kitchen. The possibilities are virtually endless!
★ MULTI COLOR, MULTI PURPOSE: This hanging wall file organizer comes in three colors; professional black, white and grey. They are great for homeschooling or for use in the classroom as a vertical fil organizer Simple divider sections keep items in this vertical file organizer separated yet easy to reach when needed. Get rid of paper clutter and keep your space neat, tidy and organized with this all-in-one hanging wall organizer!
★ NEVER LOSE A BILL AGAIN: This sturdy wall file holder makes a great wall mail organizer and is durable enough to hold a considerable number of bills, papers, magazines and more. Organize incoming and outgoing mail, bills and other documents while keeping papers orderly. No more disorganized stacks of paper or an overflowing inbox. With NEATERIZE on your side, you’ve got it all accessible and under control.

The Ultimate Wall Organizer

Designed to look good and work even better, this hanging file organizer by NEATERIZE is the perfect solution for narrow or small spaces where desk space is limited. Made from sturdy metal, each of the four divider pockets can be used as a mail holder or wall file organizer for the home or office. The bottom ledge can be used to hold pencils, pens, sticky notepads, or even as a technology docking station for your smartphone.

The colorful options also make this a great way to organize kids’ school work, drawings, coloring books, and more and are a must-have for teachers. Get one for every room in your home and be amazed at how easy organization becomes! NEATERIZE makes it possible!

  • ORGANIZE IT ALL: From mails to notes, bills to books everything you need is accessible yet protected
  • DAZZLING COLORS: With 7 unique colors to choose from, you can express your creativity and style.
  • EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Wall screws are included. Start organizing it right away with easy installation!

Product Description

Beiz Gold Desk Organizer with Sliding Drawer, 1 Tray and 5 Vertical Slot Sorters

Enjoy clean and exquisite life to the fullest with Beiz, we put users at the center of our decisions and design products that address life’s needs and help you make the most of your daily activities

Do you want a multi-function desk organizer that can store, clean and tidy desktop?Do you want your work area to be a pleasant place that reflects your bright and glamorous personality？Do you want to change your desktop from a boring space to a fashionable display area?

Beiz gold desk organizer can give you all you need

Specifications:

Color: Gold

Material: Metal

Dimensions: 12.6″L x 9.1″W x 11.8″H

Compartments : 5 upright sections and 1 tray with a 3 sections drawer

Shipping Weight: 1.1 LBS

Package: 1 x Gold workspace organizer

Beiz Desk Organizer Keeps Your Desk Organized

Creating extra storage space virtually anywhere by allowing you to add storage vertically

Gold-colored office accessories are just the thing to elevate your workspace and give it the feeling of an executive office. At the same time, it also cleans your desktop and improves efficiency

Adding a touch of gold to even mundane objects like your office supplies makes them feel a little more glamorous boosts warmth and elegance. We’re here with the perfect gold office supplies to make your office feel a little more luxurious

Trendy Gold color design Metal construction and meshes material, durable and simple Easy to assemble with no tools required Easy-slide drawers Powder-coated metal to prevent rust and scratches

【Eye-Catching Gold Desk Organizer】Beiz gold-colored desk accessories are just the thing to elevate your workspace and give it the feeling of an executive office. A touch of gold, can go a long way to elevate the look of your workspace and improve your mood, and make you more attractive
【3 in 1 Pefect Combination】Compared with the simplicity of ordinary file organizer or desk organizer, the mesh desktop file organizer has vertical and horizontal storage space – 5 vertical sorters and 1 side load letter tray, and a 3 compartments drawer(can be used independently)
【Durable Material】 The gold desktop file organizer is made of strong mesh metal with a smooth, durable, and rust-resistant ABS coating. It has rounded edges so that picking up items won’t hurt your hands
【Easy to Install】 The gold office organizer is easy to put together, and you can do it in seconds without any tools or screws. The user manual will show you how to do it. It also has 4 soft pads on the bottom to keep the desk from getting scratched
【Considerate Customer Satisfaction】The patent number is D935,524. Beiz provides professional customer service before and after purchase. We’ll do our best to take care of your needs and questions. What you can get a high-quality gold desktop organizer and friendly customer service

Product Description

Sinboun is a U.S. brand which aims to provide efficient and functional work or home office storage. A brand who prides ourselves on the high level of customer care that we offer.

Sinboun organizer is committed to creating a functional, comfortable and efficient office or home storage solution for you.

Sinboun Desktop File Organizer

With a contemporary and elegant design this tray organizer will enhance your workspace and complements any decoration. Sinboun file organizer is a desk organizer accessory for your office or home, this desk organizer keep your home and desk neat and tidy.

Made of Strong Black Metal Mesh Ideal for the Office or Home Creative & Versatile Letter Tray With Handle Classical Look and large Capacity Easy to Install & Instruction Manual Included Round Surface Edges – No Sharp Corners

Multi-purpose Tray Organizer for Your Office or Home

Sturdy design to store any A4or letter size files, documents, folders, papers, stationery, mail, magazines, books and more. A great start to re-organise your current files and endless paperwork, use our desk organizer to increase your efficiency at work.

Paper sorting and storage rack has plenty of room for your documents and folders and is crafted out of metal, to hold more weight.The top platform, keep your documents and stationery in order.

If you want an office file organizer that blends in with any decoration, this 5 tier letter tray organizer is perfect for you. Sturdy design to store any letter or A4 size files, documents, folders, papers, stationery, mail, magazines, books and more.
